Describe MainInclusionReportDotConf here.= Main Inclusion Report for libdotconf =

=== Requirements ===

0. ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/d/dotconf]]</nowiki>; available for all architectures

0. ''Rationale:''

** This package will be needed in main for speech-dispatcher, which will be replacing gnome-speech for use with gnome-orca.

** Build dependency of speech-dispatcher, which needs to be moved to main.

** 

0. ''Security:''

** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=dotconf|CVE entries]]</nowiki>: There are none at this time.

** <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=dotconf|Secunia history]]</nowiki>: There is none at this time.

** No daemons, and no binaries running as root or suid root.

** This package does not deal with network activity.

** This package does not process structure audio/video/PDF data.

** A little source code review done, nothing out of the ordinary to report, however not all code reviewed.

0. ''Quality assurance:''

** The package should work fine out of the box with no configuration.

** The package does not ask any debconf questions.

** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:dotconf|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: There are currently no bugs listed in Debian's bug tracker.

** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/d/dotconf.html|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> is dead.

** <nowiki>[[http://www.azzit.de/dotconf/|Upstream]]</nowiki> is dead.

** There is no upstream bug tracker.

** This package does not deal with hardware.

** There is no test suite in the upstream package.

0. ''UI standards:''

** This package has no user visible strings.

** This package does not have any translatable strings.

** There are no end-user applications in this package.

0. ''Standards compliance:'' 

** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant.

** Packaging system is debhelper, no patches, no packaging oddities.

0. ''Dependencies:''

** debhelper
** All build and runtime dependencies are in main.

0. ''Maintenance:''

** THis package should take care of itself, given that it has been several Ubuntu and Debian releases without an update.

** The main inclusion report author, Luke Yelavich will be responsible for monitoring this package.

** There is not currently a package contact in Ubuntu, however the main inclusion report author is willing to be the Ubuntu contact for the package.

0. ''Background information:''

** The purpose of the package is clear from the debian/control file.

** Upstream call this software dotconf, which has been the package's name throughout its lifetime.

0. ''Internationalization:''

** There are no graphical applications in this package.
